claims.object: universally adopted reference orientation for describing the human body in anatomy
standardise the position of appendages of animals with respect to the main body of the organism

surface_layer.definition: A reference orientation used to describe the human body.

deep_layer.mechanism: Provides a common frame of reference for anatomical descriptions, ensuring consistency and avoiding ambiguity.
deep_layer.origin: Developed to standardize anatomical descriptions and facilitate communication between anatomists and medical professionals.

examples: Standing upright with palms facing forward is part of the standard anatomical position.
